item.title: Building a Smart Python Code Assistant: How I Combined RAG with Semantic Search
item.description:
The Problem: Why Code Search Still Sucks
#

Picture this: You’re working on a computer vision project and need to implement face recognition. You know you want to use KNN, but you’re not sure about the exact implementation. So you do what every developer does—you Google it.

What do you get? Either overly generic tutorials that don’t fit your use case, or StackOverflow answers buried in irrelevant discussions. Sound familiar?
